    API Reference v1.0.0

    Scroll down for code samples, example requests and responses. Select a language for code samples from the tabs above or the mobile navigation menu.

    Overview

    This API in under construction and should not be used in a production environment

    The Bizyness API allows customers to create and search for accounting objects such as invoices, clients, payments and to generate various reports.

    This documentation provides information about each endpoint in the API. The right-hand pane of this page shows example requests and responses for each endpoint in cURL and many other languages.

    Getting started

    Follow these steps to start licensing media:

    1. Create a Bizyness account

    2. Go in your Settings and create an API Key, you can also use the JWT method to authenticate your requests

    Request/Response Format

    The default response format is JSON. Requests with a message-body use plain JSON to set or update resource attributes. Successful requests will return a 200 OK HTTP status.

    Some general information about responses:

    • Dates are returned in Unix timestamp, see Unix time.
    • Resource IDs are returned as strings.
    • Any decimal monetary amount, such as prices or totals, will be returned as numbers with two decimal places.
    • Other amounts, such as item counts, are returned as integers.

    Errors

    The API returns error codes such as 400, 403, 404, and 500 along with information about the error. Here are some common error responses:

    A 400 Bad Request response often means that the request body is improperly formatted or missing required fields. In the case of missing fields, the response includes the name of the field that is missing, as in the example in the right-hand column.

    A 401 Unauthorized response often means that the request did not include a valid authentication.

    A 404 Not Found response can mean that the object you are trying to access does not exist.

    A 500 Internal Server Error response means that an error happened on the server. This can mean that the request is not valid, such as if you try to delete or edit a collection that does not exist, or if the API otherwise can't do what you requested. It can also mean a temporary problem with the API. Check your request and try again or contact us.

    Pagination

    Requests that return multiple items will be restricted to 100 items by default. Alternatively the items per page can be specified with the limit parameter:

    GET /invoices?limit=200

    The (zero-based) offset query parameter is used to exclude from a response the first N items of a resource collection.

    GET /invoices?offset=10

    You can combine the limit and the offset parameters to request a particular set of items. Note that the offset option is applied before the limit option, regardless of its position in the request.

    The total entries will be set in the HTTP header X-Total-Count

    Sorting

    Multiple items returned in a request can be sorted using sort parameter.

    GET /invoices?sort=+name,-subject

    Attributes used in the sort parameter must be part of the requested resources. If multiple attributes are sorted they must be separated by a comma (,). The order of each attribute must be set using either + (ascending) or - (descending). If no sign is set, the default ordering is ascending.

    PUT/PATCH methods

    PUT and PATCH requests are used to update objects identified in the requests' paths:

    • PUT method can be used to update all attributes of an object in one call.
    • PATCH method can be used to update partial attributes of an object. This method supports JSON Patch and JSON Merge. The media type of the request is used to set the proper PATCH method, either application/json-patch+json (JSON Path) or application/merge-patch+json (JSON Merge).

    Rate limits

    All applications are limited to a certain number of API requests per minute. If your application exceeds its limit, the API returns an error response with a status code of 429.

    The API supports a limit of 10 requests per second.

    Base URLs:

    • https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0

    • https://api.bizyness.fr/v1

    Authentication

    • API Key (ApiKey)

      • Parameter Name: X-Api-Key, in: header.

    • HTTP Authentication, scheme: bearer

    Authentication

    Managing authentication

    Authenticate

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/login \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"email":"johndoe@google.com","passsword":"password123!"}'

    POST /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/login HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 57

{"email":"johndoe@google.com","passsword":"password123!"}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "email": "johndoe@google.com",
  "passsword": "password123!"
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/login");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/login")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\",\"passsword\":\"password123!\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\",\"passsword\":\"password123!\"}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/login", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/login",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\",\"passsword\":\"password123!\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/login")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\",\"passsword\":\"password123!\"}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/login"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\",\"passsword\":\"password123!\"}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /login

    Body parameter

    {
  "email": "johndoe@google.com",
  "passsword": "password123!"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body AuthenticationBody true none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VySWQiOiIxMkRERkRGREZEIiwiaWF0IjoxNjYyMjAyMzYwLCJleHAiOjE2NjI0NjE1NjB9.zbVs3S-PBdCLeK4gL4UrFPUjohzTtuK_zKeUVtyrZxs",
  "type": "Bearer",
  "user": {
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "email": "john@google.com",
    "billing_provider": "chargebee",
    "display_name": "John Doe",
    "subscription_status": "trial"
  }
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Created invoice AuthenticatedAccount
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Log out

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/logout \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    POST /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/logout HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/logout");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/logout")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/logout", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/logout",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/logout")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/logout"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /logout

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The user was logged out successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Reset password

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/forgot \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"email":"johndoe@google.com"}'

    POST /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/forgot HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 30

{"email":"johndoe@google.com"}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "email": "johndoe@google.com"
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/forgot");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/forgot")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\"}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/forgot", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/forgot",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/forgot")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\"}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/forgot"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\"}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /forgot

    Body parameter

    {
  "email": "johndoe@google.com"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body ForgotBody true none

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The password was reseted successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Invoice

    Managing your invoices

    List all invoices

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /invoices

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    offset query integer false The (zero-based) offset of the first item returned in the collection. In a zero-based offset 0 is a correct value.
    limit query integer false The maximum number of entries to return. If the value exceeds the maximum, then the maximum value will be used.
    keyword query string false The keyword to search for
    date_min query integer false Filter records created at or after date
    date_max query integer false Filter records created at or before date
    sort query string false Sort records by attributes
    status query string false Filter invoices by their status
    client_id query string false Filter invoices by client
    activity_id query string false Filter invoices by activity

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "summary": {
    "total": {
      "size": 123,
      "amount": 1203.54
    },
    "paid": {
      "size": 110,
      "amount": 1052.23
    },
    "unpaid": {
      "size": 2,
      "amount": 100
    },
    "overdue": {
      "size": 6,
      "amount": 32.3
    },
    "draft": {
      "size": 5,
      "amount": 19.01
    }
  },
  "invoices": [
    {
      "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
      "currency": "EUR",
      "draft": true,
      "discount_amount": 12.2,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "rebate": 10,

      "total_excluding_taxes": 98.12,

      "due_date": 1656540000000,

        "myfile1.png",
        "mydocument.pdf"
      ],

        "address": "123 rue des archives",

        "display_name": "John Doe"
      }
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of invoices InvoiceList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error

    Response Headers

    Status Header Type Format Description
    200 X-Total-Count integer Total entries
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Create an invoice

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"currency":"EUR","draft":true,"discount_amount":12.2,"discount_type":"percentage","rebate":10,"activity_id":"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf","template":"basic","shipping_amount":4.5,"shipping_tax_rate":20,"taxes_liable":true,"taxes_included":true,"client_id":"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf","billing_address":{"address":"123 rue des archives","address_supplement":"Porte gauche","zip":"A1234","city":"Paris","country_code":"FR","last_name":"Doe","first_name":"John","company_name":"John'\''s company","vat_number":"FR123456789","display_name":"John Doe"},"subject":"Design of the homepage","lines":[{"sku":"AX123","description":"Mockup and copywriting","title":"Homepage design","type":0,"price":120.32,"quantity":1,"unit":"piece","discount_amount":10,"discount_type":"percentage","tax_rate":20,"origin_country_code":"FR","second_hand_good":false,"disbursement_fees":false,"article_id":"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf"},{"sku":"AX456","description":"Logo with 3 colors","title":"Logo design","type":0,"price":59,"quantity":1,"unit":"piece","discount_amount":0,"discount_type":"percentage","tax_rate":20,"origin_country_code":"FR","second_hand_good":false,"disbursement_fees":false,"article_id":"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf"}],"lines_groups":[{"name":"Design and mockup","articles":[0,1]}],"comments":"Payment to be done within 3 days","payment_conditions_included":true,"language":"fr","tax_exemption_text":"Article 138 CE/2008","payment_methods":["cash","credit_card"],"execution_date":1566493220992,"online_payment_enabled":true,"payment_gateways_id":["5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf","5b17da549a7feb695f703975"],"tracking_numbers":["456SDFDFD"],"tracking_carriers":["UPS"]}'

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}"

puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /invoices

    Body parameter

    {
  "currency": "EUR",
  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,
  "discount_type": "percentage",
  "rebate": 10,
  "activity_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "template": "basic",
  "shipping_amount": 4.5,
  "shipping_tax_rate": 20,
  "taxes_liable": true,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "client_id": "54tefds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "billing_address": {
    "address": "123 rue des archives",
    "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
    "zip": "A1234",
    "city": "Paris",
    "country_code": "FR",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "first_name": "John",
    "company_name": "John's company",
    "vat_number": "FR123456789",
    "display_name": "John Doe"
  },
  "subject": "Design of the homepage",
  "lines": [
    {
      "sku": "AX123",
      "description": "Mockup and copywriting",
      "title": "Homepage design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 120.32,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 10,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf"
    },
    {
      "sku": "AX456",
      "description": "Logo with 3 colors",
      "title": "Logo design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 59,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 0,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf"
    }
  ],
  "lines_groups": [
    {
      "name": "Design and mockup",
      "articles": [
        0,
        1
      ]
    }
  ],
  "comments": "Payment to be done within 3 days",
  "payment_conditions_included": true,
  "language": "fr",
  "tax_exemption_text": "Article 138 CE/2008",
  "payment_methods": [
    "cash",
    "credit_card"
  ],
  "execution_date": 1566493220992,
  "online_payment_enabled": true,
  "payment_gateways_id": [
    "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
    "5b17da549a7feb695f703975"
  ],
  "tracking_numbers": [
    "456SDFDFD"
  ],
  "tracking_carriers": [
    "UPS"
  ]
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body InvoiceBody true none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Created invoice Invoice
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Preview the PDF

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/preview \
  --header 'Accept: application/pdf' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"currency":"EUR","draft":true,"discount_amount":12.2,"discount_type":"percentage","rebate":10,"activity_id":"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf","template":"basic","shipping_amount":4.5,"shipping_tax_rate":20,"taxes_liable":true,"taxes_included":true,"client_id":"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf","billing_address":{"address":"123 rue des archives","address_supplement":"Porte gauche","zip":"A1234","city":"Paris","country_code":"FR","last_name":"Doe","first_name":"John","company_name":"John'\''s company","vat_number":"FR123456789","display_name":"John Doe"},"subject":"Design of the homepage","lines":[{"sku":"AX123","description":"Mockup and copywriting","title":"Homepage design","type":0,"price":120.32,"quantity":1,"unit":"piece","discount_amount":10,"discount_type":"percentage","tax_rate":20,"origin_country_code":"FR","second_hand_good":false,"disbursement_fees":false,"article_id":"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf"},{"sku":"AX456","description":"Logo with 3 colors","title":"Logo design","type":0,"price":59,"quantity":1,"unit":"piece","discount_amount":0,"discount_type":"percentage","tax_rate":20,"origin_country_code":"FR","second_hand_good":false,"disbursement_fees":false,"article_id":"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf"}],"lines_groups":[{"name":"Design and mockup","articles":[0,1]}],"comments":"Payment to be done within 3 days","payment_conditions_included":true,"language":"fr","tax_exemption_text":"Article 138 CE/2008","payment_methods":["cash","credit_card"],"execution_date":1566493220992,"online_payment_enabled":true,"payment_gateways_id":["5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf","5b17da549a7feb695f703975"],"tracking_numbers":["456SDFDFD"],"tracking_carriers":["UPS"]}'

    POST /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/preview HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/pdf
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 1649

{"currency":"EUR","draft":true,"discount_amount":12.2,"discount_type":"percentage","rebate":10,"activity_id":"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf","template":"basic","shipping_amount":4.5,"shipping_tax_rate":20,"taxes_liable":true,"taxes_included":true,"client_id":"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf","billing_address":{"address":"123 rue des archives","address_supplement":"Porte gauche","zip":"A1234","city":"Paris","country_code":"FR","last_name":"Doe","first_name":"John","company_name":"John's company","vat_number":"FR123456789","display_name":"John Doe"},"subject":"Design of the homepage","lines":[{"sku":"AX123","description":"Mockup and copywriting","title":"Homepage design","type":0,"price":120.32,"quantity":1,"unit":"piece","discount_amount":10,"discount_type":"percentage","tax_rate":20,"origin_country_code":"FR","second_hand_good":false,"disbursement_fees":false,"article_id":"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf"},{"sku":"AX456","description":"Logo with 3 colors","title":"Logo design","type":0,"price":59,"quantity":1,"unit":"piece","discount_amount":0,"discount_type":"percentage","tax_rate":20,"origin_country_code":"FR","second_hand_good":false,"disbursement_fees":false,"article_id":"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf"}],"lines_groups":[{"name":"Design and mockup","articles":[0,1]}],"comments":"Payment to be done within 3 days","payment_conditions_included":true,"language":"fr","tax_exemption_text":"Article 138 CE/2008","payment_methods":["cash","credit_card"],"execution_date":1566493220992,"online_payment_enabled":true,"payment_gateways_id":["5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf","5b17da549a7feb695f703975"],"tracking_numbers":["456SDFDFD"],"tracking_carriers":["UPS"]}

  "currency": "EUR",
  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,
  "discount_type": "percentage",

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/preview");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/pdf");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/preview")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/pdf'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/pdf",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/preview", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/preview",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/pdf",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/preview")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/pdf")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/preview"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/pdf")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /invoices/preview

    Body parameter

    {
  "currency": "EUR",
  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,
  "discount_type": "percentage",
  "rebate": 10,
  "activity_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "template": "basic",
  "shipping_amount": 4.5,
  "shipping_tax_rate": 20,
  "taxes_liable": true,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "client_id": "54tefds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "billing_address": {
    "address": "123 rue des archives",
    "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
    "zip": "A1234",
    "city": "Paris",
    "country_code": "FR",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "first_name": "John",
    "company_name": "John's company",
    "vat_number": "FR123456789",
    "display_name": "John Doe"
  },
  "subject": "Design of the homepage",
  "lines": [
    {
      "sku": "AX123",
      "description": "Mockup and copywriting",
      "title": "Homepage design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 120.32,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 10,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf"
    },
    {
      "sku": "AX456",
      "description": "Logo with 3 colors",
      "title": "Logo design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 59,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 0,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf"
    }
  ],
  "lines_groups": [
    {
      "name": "Design and mockup",
      "articles": [
        0,
        1
      ]
    }
  ],
  "comments": "Payment to be done within 3 days",
  "payment_conditions_included": true,
  "language": "fr",
  "tax_exemption_text": "Article 138 CE/2008",
  "payment_methods": [
    "cash",
    "credit_card"
  ],
  "execution_date": 1566493220992,
  "online_payment_enabled": true,
  "payment_gateways_id": [
    "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
    "5b17da549a7feb695f703975"
  ],
  "tracking_numbers": [
    "456SDFDFD"
  ],
  "tracking_carriers": [
    "UPS"
  ]
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body InvoiceBody true none

    Example responses

    Return the PDF file

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the PDF file string
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Retrieve payments

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /invoices/{id}/payments

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Invoice ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "payments": [
    {
      "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
      "amount": 123.21,
      "currency": "EUR",
      "label": "Subscription",
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
      "method": "cash"
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK List of payments PaymentList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Create an payment

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"amount":123.21,"currency":"EUR","label":"Subscription","date":1566493220992,"comment":"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow","method":"cash"}'

    POST /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 152

{"amount":123.21,"currency":"EUR","label":"Subscription","date":1566493220992,"comment":"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow","method":"cash"}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "amount": 123.21,
  "currency": "EUR",
  "label": "Subscription",
  "date": 1566493220992,
  "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
  "method": "cash"
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"amount\":123.21,\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"label\":\"Subscription\",\"date\":1566493220992,\"comment\":\"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow\",\"method\":\"cash\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"amount\":123.21,\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"label\":\"Subscription\",\"date\":1566493220992,\"comment\":\"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow\",\"method\":\"cash\"}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"amount\":123.21,\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"label\":\"Subscription\",\"date\":1566493220992,\"comment\":\"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow\",\"method\":\"cash\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"amount\":123.21,\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"label\":\"Subscription\",\"date\":1566493220992,\"comment\":\"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow\",\"method\":\"cash\"}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/payments"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"amount\":123.21,\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"label\":\"Subscription\",\"date\":1566493220992,\"comment\":\"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow\",\"method\":\"cash\"}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /invoices/{id}/payments

    Body parameter

    {
  "amount": 123.21,
  "currency": "EUR",
  "label": "Subscription",
  "date": 1566493220992,
  "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
  "method": "cash"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body PaymentBody true none
    id path string true Invoice ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "amount": 123.21,
  "currency": "EUR",
  "label": "Subscription",
  "date": 1566493220992,
  "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
  "method": "cash"
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Created payment Payment
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Download the PDF

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/download \
  --header 'Accept: application/pdf' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/download HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/pdf
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/download");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/pdf");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/download"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/pdf")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /invoices/{id}/download

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Invoice ID

    Example responses

    Return the PDF file

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the PDF file string
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Retrieve credit notes

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /invoices/{id}/creditNotes

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Invoice ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "credit_notes": [
    {
      "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
      "currency": "EUR",
      "draft": true,
      "discount_amount": 12.2,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "rebate": 10,

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK List of credit notes CreditNoteList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error

  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}"
