puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/creditNotes"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /invoices/{id}/creditNotes

    Body parameter

    {
  "currency": "EUR",
  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,
  "discount_type": "percentage",
  "rebate": 10,
  "activity_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "template": "basic",
  "shipping_amount": 4.5,
  "shipping_tax_rate": 20,
  "taxes_liable": true,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "client_id": "54tefds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "billing_address": {
    "address": "123 rue des archives",
    "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
    "zip": "A1234",
    "city": "Paris",
    "country_code": "FR",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "first_name": "John",
    "company_name": "John's company",
    "vat_number": "FR123456789",
    "display_name": "John Doe"
  },
  "subject": "Design of the homepage",
  "lines": [
    {
      "sku": "AX123",
      "description": "Mockup and copywriting",
      "title": "Homepage design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 120.32,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 10,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf"
    },
    {
      "sku": "AX456",
      "description": "Logo with 3 colors",
      "title": "Logo design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 59,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 0,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf"
    }
  ],

      "name": "Design and mockup",
      "articles": [
        0,
        1
      ]
    }
  ],

  "language": "fr",

    "cash",
    "credit_card"
  ],

  "online_payment_enabled": true,
  "payment_gateways_id": [
    "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
    "5b17da549a7feb695f703975"
  ],
  "tracking_numbers": [
    "456SDFDFD"
  ],
  "tracking_carriers": [
    "UPS"
  ]
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body InvoiceBody true none
    id path string true Invoice ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Created credit note Invoice
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Add a list of attachments

    Code samples

    POST /invoices/{id}/attachments

    Body parameter

    file:
  - string

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body object true none
    file body [string] false none
    id path string true Invoice ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "currency": "EUR",
  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,

  "message": "Resource not found"

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated invoice Invoice
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Delete an attachment

    Code samples

    curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    DELETE /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("DELETE", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("DELETE", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "DELETE",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.delete("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("DELETE", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    DELETE /invoices/{id}/attachments/{attachmentId}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Invoice ID
    attachmentId path integer true Attachment index

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The attachment was deleted successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Download an attachment file

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0 \
  --header 'Accept: application/pdf' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/pdf
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/pdf");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/pdf'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/pdf",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/pdf",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0")
  .header("Accept", "application/pdf")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/pdf")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /invoices/{id}/attachments/{attachmentId}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Invoice ID
    attachmentId path integer true Attachment index

    Example responses

    Return the attachment file

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the attachment file string
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Retrieve an invoice

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    Name In Type Required Description

    Example responses

    200 Response

  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,

      "disbursement_fees": false,

    }

      ]

      "date": 1566423220992,
      "key": "invoice.history.issued",
      "values": []
    }

}

}

  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return a single invoice Invoice

    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Delete an invoice

    Code samples

    curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    DELETE /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com

  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("DELETE", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    DELETE /invoices/{id}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Invoice ID

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The invoice was deleted successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Code samples

  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Put.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}"

puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PUT", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.put("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PUT", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PUT /invoices/{id}

    Body parameter

    {
  "currency": "EUR",
  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,
  "discount_type": "percentage",
  "rebate": 10,
  "activity_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "template": "basic",
  "shipping_amount": 4.5,
  "shipping_tax_rate": 20,
  "taxes_liable": true,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "client_id": "54tefds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "billing_address": {
    "address": "123 rue des archives",
    "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
    "zip": "A1234",
    "city": "Paris",

    "display_name": "John Doe"

      "type": 0,

    "456SDFDFD"

  ]
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body InvoiceBody true none
    id path string true Invoice ID

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated invoice Invoice
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update an invoice (partial)

    Code samples

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '[{"op":"replace","path":"/lines/0/type","value":1}]'

    PATCH /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 51

[{"op":"replace","path":"/lines/0/type","value":1}]

    const data = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/lines/0/type\",\"value\":1}]";

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PATCH", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json-patch+json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/lines/0/type\",\"value\":1}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/lines/0/type\",\"value\":1}]"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json-patch+json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PATCH",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/lines/0/type\",\"value\":1}]",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/lines/0/type\",\"value\":1}]")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885"

    payload := strings.NewReader("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/lines/0/type\",\"value\":1}]")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PATCH", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PATCH /invoices/{id}

    Body parameter

    [
  {
    "op": "replace",
    "path": "/lines/0/type",
    "value": 1
  }
]

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body array[any] true none
    id path string true Invoice ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "currency": "EUR",
  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,
  "discount_type": "percentage",
  "rebate": 10,
  "activity_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "template": "basic",
  "shipping_amount": 4.5,
  "shipping_tax_rate": 20,
  "taxes_liable": true,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "client_id": "54tefds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "billing_address": {
    "address": "123 rue des archives",
    "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
    "zip": "A1234",
    "city": "Paris",
    "country_code": "FR",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "first_name": "John",
    "company_name": "John's company",
    "vat_number": "FR123456789",
    "display_name": "John Doe"
  },
  "subject": "Design of the homepage",
  "lines": [
    {
      "sku": "AX123",
      "description": "Mockup and copywriting",
      "title": "Homepage design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 120.32,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 10,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf"
    },
    {
      "sku": "AX456",
      "description": "Logo with 3 colors",
      "title": "Logo design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 59,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 0,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf"
    }
  ],
  "lines_groups": [
    {
      "name": "Design and mockup",
      "articles": [
        0,
        1
      ]
    }
  ],
  "comments": "Payment to be done within 3 days",
  "payment_conditions_included": true,
  "language": "fr",
  "tax_exemption_text": "Article 138 CE/2008",
  "payment_methods": [
    "cash",
    "credit_card"
  ],
  "execution_date": 1566493220992,
  "online_payment_enabled": true,
  "payment_gateways_id": [
    "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
    "5b17da549a7feb695f703975"
  ],
  "tracking_numbers": [
    "456SDFDFD"
  ],
  "tracking_carriers": [
    "UPS"
  ],
  "events": [
    {
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "key": "invoice.history.paymentAdded",
      "values": [
        "23.32",
        ""
      ]
    },
    {
      "date": 1566423220992,
      "key": "invoice.history.issued",
      "values": []
    }
  ],
  "total_including_taxes": 123.54,
  "total_excluding_taxes": 98.12,
  "date": 1566423220992,
  "name": "202212345",
  "status": "draft",
  "paid_date": 1566493220992,
  "due_date": 1656540000000,
  "attachments": [
    "myfile1.png",
    "mydocument.pdf"
  ],
  "client_address": {
    "address": "123 rue des archives",
    "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
    "zip": "A1234",
    "city": "Paris",
    "country_code": "FR",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "first_name": "John",
    "company_name": "John's company",
    "vat_number": "FR123456789",
    "display_name": "John Doe"
  }
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated invoice Invoice
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Send an invoice

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/send \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"email":"johndoe@google.com","title":"Here is your invoice","body":"Please find attached your invoice"}'

    POST /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/send HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 104

{"email":"johndoe@google.com","title":"Here is your invoice","body":"Please find attached your invoice"}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "email": "johndoe@google.com",
  "title": "Here is your invoice",
  "body": "Please find attached your invoice"
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/send");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/send")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\",\"title\":\"Here is your invoice\",\"body\":\"Please find attached your invoice\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\",\"title\":\"Here is your invoice\",\"body\":\"Please find attached your invoice\"}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/send", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/send",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\",\"title\":\"Here is your invoice\",\"body\":\"Please find attached your invoice\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/send")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\",\"title\":\"Here is your invoice\",\"body\":\"Please find attached your invoice\"}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/invoices/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/send"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"email\":\"johndoe@google.com\",\"title\":\"Here is your invoice\",\"body\":\"Please find attached your invoice\"}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /invoices/{id}/send

    Body parameter

    {
  "email": "johndoe@google.com",
  "title": "Here is your invoice",
  "body": "Please find attached your invoice"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body BillOfSaleSendBody true none
    id path string true Invoice ID

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The invoice was sent successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Payment

    Managing your payments

    List all payments

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /payments

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    offset query integer false The (zero-based) offset of the first item returned in the collection. In a zero-based offset 0 is a correct value.
    limit query integer false The maximum number of entries to return. If the value exceeds the maximum, then the maximum value will be used.
    sort query string false Sort records by attributes

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "payments": [
    {
      "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
      "amount": 123.21,
      "currency": "EUR",
      "label": "Subscription",
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
      "method": "cash"
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of payments PaymentList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error

    Response Headers

    Status Header Type Format Description
    200 X-Total-Count integer Total entries
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Retrieve a payment

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");

    GET /payments/{id}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "amount": 123.21,
  "currency": "EUR",
  "label": "Subscription",
  "date": 1566493220992,
  "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
  "method": "cash"
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return a single payment Payment
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Delete a payment

    Code samples

    curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    DELETE /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("DELETE", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")

http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    <?php

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("DELETE", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    DELETE /payments/{id}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Payment ID

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The payment was deleted successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update a payment

    Code samples

    curl --request PUT \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"amount":123.21,"currency":"EUR","label":"Subscription","date":1566493220992,"comment":"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow","method":"cash"}'

    PUT /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 152

{"amount":123.21,"currency":"EUR","label":"Subscription","date":1566493220992,"comment":"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow","method":"cash"}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "amount": 123.21,
  "currency": "EUR",
  "label": "Subscription",
  "date": 1566493220992,
  "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
  "method": "cash"
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PUT", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Put.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"amount\":123.21,\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"label\":\"Subscription\",\"date\":1566493220992,\"comment\":\"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow\",\"method\":\"cash\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"amount\":123.21,\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"label\":\"Subscription\",\"date\":1566493220992,\"comment\":\"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow\",\"method\":\"cash\"}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PUT", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"amount\":123.21,\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"label\":\"Subscription\",\"date\":1566493220992,\"comment\":\"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow\",\"method\":\"cash\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.put("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"amount\":123.21,\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"label\":\"Subscription\",\"date\":1566493220992,\"comment\":\"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow\",\"method\":\"cash\"}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"amount\":123.21,\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"label\":\"Subscription\",\"date\":1566493220992,\"comment\":\"Client will provide the next payment tomorrow\",\"method\":\"cash\"}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PUT", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PUT /payments/{id}

    Body parameter

    {
  "amount": 123.21,
  "currency": "EUR",
  "label": "Subscription",
  "date": 1566493220992,
  "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
  "method": "cash"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body PaymentBody true none
    id path string true Payment ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "amount": 123.21,
  "currency": "EUR",
  "label": "Subscription",
  "date": 1566493220992,
  "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
  "method": "cash"
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated payment Payment
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update a payment (partial)

    Code samples

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '[{"op":"replace","path":"/label","value":"Other subscription"}]'

    PATCH /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 63

[{"op":"replace","path":"/label","value":"Other subscription"}]

    const data = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/label\",\"value\":\"Other subscription\"}]";

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PATCH", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json-patch+json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/label\",\"value\":\"Other subscription\"}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/label\",\"value\":\"Other subscription\"}]"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json-patch+json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PATCH",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/label\",\"value\":\"Other subscription\"}]",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/label\",\"value\":\"Other subscription\"}]")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payments/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    payload := strings.NewReader("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/label\",\"value\":\"Other subscription\"}]")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PATCH", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PATCH /payments/{id}

    Body parameter

    [
  {
    "op": "replace",
    "path": "/label",
    "value": "Other subscription"
  }
]

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body array[any] true none
    id path string true Payment ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "amount": 123.21,
  "currency": "EUR",
  "label": "Subscription",
  "date": 1566493220992,
  "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
  "method": "cash"
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated article Payment
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Client

    Managing your clients

    Code samples

  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$err = curl_error($curl);

  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
