    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /clients

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    offset query integer false The (zero-based) offset of the first item returned in the collection. In a zero-based offset 0 is a correct value.
    limit query integer false The maximum number of entries to return. If the value exceeds the maximum, then the maximum value will be used.
    keyword query string false The keyword to search for
    sort query string false Sort records by attributes

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "clients": [
    {
      "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
      "type": "individual",
      "last_name": "Doe",
      "first_name": "John",
      "email": "john.doe@google.com",
      "phone": 6215410124,
      "company_name": "Doe's company",
      "address": "123 rue des archives",
      "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
      "zip": "A1234",
      "city": "Paris",
      "country_code": "FR",
      "vat_number": "FR123456789",
      "notes": [
        {
          "date": 1566493220992,
          "title": "My first note",
          "content": "This the content of this wonderful note"
        },
        {
          "date": 1586493220992,
          "title": "Another note",
          "content": "Just another note content"
        }
      ],
      "attachments": [
        [
          "myfile1.png",
          "mydocument.pdf"
        ]
      ]
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of clients ClientList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error

    Response Headers

    Status Header Type Format Description
    200 X-Total-Count integer Total entries
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Create a client

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"type":"individual","last_name":"Doe","first_name":"John","email":"john.doe@google.com","phone":6215410124,"company_name":"Doe'\''s company","address":"123 rue des archives","address_supplement":"Porte gauche","zip":"A1234","city":"Paris","country_code":"FR","vat_number":"FR123456789","notes":[{"date":1566493220992,"title":"My first note","content":"This the content of this wonderful note"},{"date":1586493220992,"title":"Another note","content":"Just another note content"}]}'

    POST /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 477

{"type":"individual","last_name":"Doe","first_name":"John","email":"john.doe@google.com","phone":6215410124,"company_name":"Doe's company","address":"123 rue des archives","address_supplement":"Porte gauche","zip":"A1234","city":"Paris","country_code":"FR","vat_number":"FR123456789","notes":[{"date":1566493220992,"title":"My first note","content":"This the content of this wonderful note"},{"date":1586493220992,"title":"Another note","content":"Just another note content"}]}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "type": "individual",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "first_name": "John",
  "email": "john.doe@google.com",
  "phone": 6215410124,
  "company_name": "Doe's company",
  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "vat_number": "FR123456789",
  "notes": [
    {
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "title": "My first note",
      "content": "This the content of this wonderful note"
    },
    {
      "date": 1586493220992,
      "title": "Another note",
      "content": "Just another note content"
    }
  ]
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"type\":\"individual\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"email\":\"john.doe@google.com\",\"phone\":6215410124,\"company_name\":\"Doe's company\",\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"notes\":[{\"date\":1566493220992,\"title\":\"My first note\",\"content\":\"This the content of this wonderful note\"},{\"date\":1586493220992,\"title\":\"Another note\",\"content\":\"Just another note content\"}]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"type\":\"individual\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"email\":\"john.doe@google.com\",\"phone\":6215410124,\"company_name\":\"Doe's company\",\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"notes\":[{\"date\":1566493220992,\"title\":\"My first note\",\"content\":\"This the content of this wonderful note\"},{\"date\":1586493220992,\"title\":\"Another note\",\"content\":\"Just another note content\"}]}"

    'Content-Type': "application/json",

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"type\":\"individual\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"email\":\"john.doe@google.com\",\"phone\":6215410124,\"company_name\":\"Doe's company\",\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"notes\":[{\"date\":1566493220992,\"title\":\"My first note\",\"content\":\"This the content of this wonderful note\"},{\"date\":1586493220992,\"title\":\"Another note\",\"content\":\"Just another note content\"}]}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /clients

    Body parameter

    {
  "type": "individual",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "first_name": "John",
  "email": "john.doe@google.com",
  "phone": 6215410124,
  "company_name": "Doe's company",
  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "vat_number": "FR123456789",
  "notes": [
    {
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "title": "My first note",
      "content": "This the content of this wonderful note"
    },
    {
      "date": 1586493220992,
      "title": "Another note",
      "content": "Just another note content"
    }
  ]
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body ClientBody true none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "type": "individual",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "first_name": "John",
  "email": "john.doe@google.com",
  "phone": 6215410124,
  "company_name": "Doe's company",
  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "vat_number": "FR123456789",
  "notes": [
    {
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "title": "My first note",
      "content": "This the content of this wonderful note"
    },
    {
      "date": 1586493220992,
      "title": "Another note",
      "content": "Just another note content"
    }
  ],
  "attachments": [
    [
      "myfile1.png",
      "mydocument.pdf"
    ]
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Created client Client
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    List top clients

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/top \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/top HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/top");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/top")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/top", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/top",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/top")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/top"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /clients/top

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    offset query integer false The (zero-based) offset of the first item returned in the collection. In a zero-based offset 0 is a correct value.
    limit query integer false The maximum number of entries to return. If the value exceeds the maximum, then the maximum value will be used.

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "clients": [
    {
      "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
      "type": "individual",
      "last_name": "Doe",
      "first_name": "John",
      "email": "john.doe@google.com",
      "phone": 6215410124,
      "company_name": "Doe's company",
      "address": "123 rue des archives",
      "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
      "zip": "A1234",
      "city": "Paris",
      "country_code": "FR",
      "vat_number": "FR123456789",
      "notes": [
        {
          "date": 1566493220992,
          "title": "My first note",
          "content": "This the content of this wonderful note"
        },
        {
          "date": 1586493220992,
          "title": "Another note",
          "content": "Just another note content"
        }
      ],
      "attachments": [
        [
          "myfile1.png",
          "mydocument.pdf"
        ]
      ]
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of clients sorting by the number of time they have been billed, in descending order ClientList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error

    Response Headers

    Status Header Type Format Description
    200 X-Total-Count integer Total entries
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Add a list of attachments

    Code samples

    POST /clients/{id}/attachments

    Body parameter

    file:
  - string

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body object true none
    file body [string] false none
    id path string true Client ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "type": "individual",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "first_name": "John",
  "email": "john.doe@google.com",
  "phone": 6215410124,
  "company_name": "Doe's company",
  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "vat_number": "FR123456789",
  "notes": [
    {
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "title": "My first note",
      "content": "This the content of this wonderful note"
    },
    {
      "date": 1586493220992,
      "title": "Another note",
      "content": "Just another note content"
    }
  ],
  "attachments": [
    [
      "myfile1.png",
      "mydocument.pdf"
    ]
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated client Client
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Delete an attachment

    Code samples

    curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    DELETE /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("DELETE", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "DELETE",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.delete("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945e14ce97a4c1c561885/attachments/0"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("DELETE", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    DELETE /clients/{id}/attachments/{attachmentId}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Client ID
    attachmentId path integer true Attachment index

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The attachment was deleted successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Retrieve a client

    Code samples

  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    Delete a client

    Code samples

    curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    DELETE /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("DELETE", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("DELETE", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "DELETE",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.delete("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("DELETE", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    DELETE /clients/{id}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Client ID

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The client was deleted successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update a client

    Code samples

    curl --request PUT \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"type":"individual","last_name":"Doe","first_name":"John","email":"john.doe@google.com","phone":6215410124,"company_name":"Doe'\''s company","address":"123 rue des archives","address_supplement":"Porte gauche","zip":"A1234","city":"Paris","country_code":"FR","vat_number":"FR123456789","notes":[{"date":1566493220992,"title":"My first note","content":"This the content of this wonderful note"},{"date":1586493220992,"title":"Another note","content":"Just another note content"}]}'

Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 477

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "type": "individual",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "first_name": "John",
  "email": "john.doe@google.com",
  "phone": 6215410124,
  "company_name": "Doe's company",
  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "vat_number": "FR123456789",
  "notes": [
    {
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "title": "My first note",
      "content": "This the content of this wonderful note"
    },
    {
      "date": 1586493220992,
      "title": "Another note",
      "content": "Just another note content"
    }
  ]
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PUT", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Put.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"type\":\"individual\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"email\":\"john.doe@google.com\",\"phone\":6215410124,\"company_name\":\"Doe's company\",\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"notes\":[{\"date\":1566493220992,\"title\":\"My first note\",\"content\":\"This the content of this wonderful note\"},{\"date\":1586493220992,\"title\":\"Another note\",\"content\":\"Just another note content\"}]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"type\":\"individual\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"email\":\"john.doe@google.com\",\"phone\":6215410124,\"company_name\":\"Doe's company\",\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"notes\":[{\"date\":1566493220992,\"title\":\"My first note\",\"content\":\"This the content of this wonderful note\"},{\"date\":1586493220992,\"title\":\"Another note\",\"content\":\"Just another note content\"}]}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PUT", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"type\":\"individual\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"email\":\"john.doe@google.com\",\"phone\":6215410124,\"company_name\":\"Doe's company\",\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"notes\":[{\"date\":1566493220992,\"title\":\"My first note\",\"content\":\"This the content of this wonderful note\"},{\"date\":1586493220992,\"title\":\"Another note\",\"content\":\"Just another note content\"}]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.put("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"type\":\"individual\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"email\":\"john.doe@google.com\",\"phone\":6215410124,\"company_name\":\"Doe's company\",\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"notes\":[{\"date\":1566493220992,\"title\":\"My first note\",\"content\":\"This the content of this wonderful note\"},{\"date\":1586493220992,\"title\":\"Another note\",\"content\":\"Just another note content\"}]}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"type\":\"individual\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"email\":\"john.doe@google.com\",\"phone\":6215410124,\"company_name\":\"Doe's company\",\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"notes\":[{\"date\":1566493220992,\"title\":\"My first note\",\"content\":\"This the content of this wonderful note\"},{\"date\":1586493220992,\"title\":\"Another note\",\"content\":\"Just another note content\"}]}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PUT", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PUT /clients/{id}

    Body parameter

    {
  "type": "individual",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "first_name": "John",
  "email": "john.doe@google.com",
  "phone": 6215410124,
  "company_name": "Doe's company",
  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "vat_number": "FR123456789",
  "notes": [
    {
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "title": "My first note",
      "content": "This the content of this wonderful note"
    },
    {
      "date": 1586493220992,
      "title": "Another note",
      "content": "Just another note content"
    }
  ]
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body ClientBody true none
    id path string true Client ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "type": "individual",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "first_name": "John",
  "email": "john.doe@google.com",
  "phone": 6215410124,
  "company_name": "Doe's company",
  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "vat_number": "FR123456789",
  "notes": [
    {
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "title": "My first note",
      "content": "This the content of this wonderful note"
    },
    {
      "date": 1586493220992,
      "title": "Another note",
      "content": "Just another note content"
    }
  ],
  "attachments": [
    [
      "myfile1.png",
      "mydocument.pdf"
    ]
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated client Client
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update a client (partial)

    Code samples

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '[{"op":"replace","path":"/last_name","value":"Dupont"}]'

    PATCH /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 55

[{"op":"replace","path":"/last_name","value":"Dupont"}]

    const data = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]";

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PATCH", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json-patch+json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json-patch+json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PATCH",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/clients/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    payload := strings.NewReader("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PATCH", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PATCH /clients/{id}

    Body parameter

    [
  {
    "op": "replace",
    "path": "/last_name",
    "value": "Dupont"
  }
]

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body array[any] true none
    id path string true Client ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "type": "individual",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "first_name": "John",
  "email": "john.doe@google.com",
  "phone": 6215410124,
  "company_name": "Doe's company",
  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "vat_number": "FR123456789",
  "notes": [
    {
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "title": "My first note",
      "content": "This the content of this wonderful note"
    },
    {
      "date": 1586493220992,
      "title": "Another note",
      "content": "Just another note content"
    }
  ],
  "attachments": [
    [
      "myfile1.png",
      "mydocument.pdf"
    ]
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    200 OK Updated client Client

    Article

    Managing your articles

    List all articles

    Code samples

  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /articles

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    keyword query string false The keyword to search for
    offset query integer false The (zero-based) offset of the first item returned in the collection. In a zero-based offset 0 is a correct value.
    limit query integer false The maximum number of entries to return. If the value exceeds the maximum, then the maximum value will be used.
    sort query string false Sort records by attributes

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "articles": [
    {
      "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
      "manufacturer": "Apple",
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "price": 10.32,
      "purchase_price": 10.32,
      "sku": "AZ123",
      "title": "Shirt",
      "description": "Size M",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "type": 0,
      "taxes_included": true,
      "second_hand_good": true
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of articles ArticleList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error

    Response Headers

    Status Header Type Format Description
    200 X-Total-Count integer Total entries
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Create an article

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"manufacturer":"Apple","origin_country_code":"FR","price":10.32,"purchase_price":10.32,"sku":"AZ123","title":"Shirt","description":"Size M","tax_rate":20,"type":0,"taxes_included":true,"second_hand_good":true}'

    POST /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 210

{"manufacturer":"Apple","origin_country_code":"FR","price":10.32,"purchase_price":10.32,"sku":"AZ123","title":"Shirt","description":"Size M","tax_rate":20,"type":0,"taxes_included":true,"second_hand_good":true}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "manufacturer": "Apple",
  "origin_country_code": "FR",
  "price": 10.32,
  "purchase_price": 10.32,
  "sku": "AZ123",
  "title": "Shirt",
  "description": "Size M",
  "tax_rate": 20,
  "type": 0,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "second_hand_good": true
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"manufacturer\":\"Apple\",\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"price\":10.32,\"purchase_price\":10.32,\"sku\":\"AZ123\",\"title\":\"Shirt\",\"description\":\"Size M\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"type\":0,\"taxes_included\":true,\"second_hand_good\":true}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"manufacturer\":\"Apple\",\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"price\":10.32,\"purchase_price\":10.32,\"sku\":\"AZ123\",\"title\":\"Shirt\",\"description\":\"Size M\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"type\":0,\"taxes_included\":true,\"second_hand_good\":true}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"manufacturer\":\"Apple\",\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"price\":10.32,\"purchase_price\":10.32,\"sku\":\"AZ123\",\"title\":\"Shirt\",\"description\":\"Size M\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"type\":0,\"taxes_included\":true,\"second_hand_good\":true}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"manufacturer\":\"Apple\",\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"price\":10.32,\"purchase_price\":10.32,\"sku\":\"AZ123\",\"title\":\"Shirt\",\"description\":\"Size M\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"type\":0,\"taxes_included\":true,\"second_hand_good\":true}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"manufacturer\":\"Apple\",\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"price\":10.32,\"purchase_price\":10.32,\"sku\":\"AZ123\",\"title\":\"Shirt\",\"description\":\"Size M\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"type\":0,\"taxes_included\":true,\"second_hand_good\":true}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /articles

    Body parameter

    {
  "manufacturer": "Apple",
  "origin_country_code": "FR",
  "price": 10.32,
  "purchase_price": 10.32,
  "sku": "AZ123",
  "title": "Shirt",
  "description": "Size M",
  "tax_rate": 20,
  "type": 0,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "second_hand_good": true
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body ArticleBody true none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Created invoice Invoice
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Retrieve an article

    Code samples

  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

Accept: application/json

Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /articles/{id}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Article ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "manufacturer": "Apple",
  "origin_country_code": "FR",
  "price": 10.32,
  "purchase_price": 10.32,
  "sku": "AZ123",
  "title": "Shirt",
  "description": "Size M",
  "tax_rate": 20,
  "type": 0,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "second_hand_good": true
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return a single article Article
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Delete an article

    Code samples

    curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    DELETE /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("DELETE", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'

    package main

    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    DELETE /articles/{id}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Article ID

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The article was deleted successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update an article

    Code samples

    curl --request PUT \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"manufacturer":"Apple","origin_country_code":"FR","price":10.32,"purchase_price":10.32,"sku":"AZ123","title":"Shirt","description":"Size M","tax_rate":20,"type":0,"taxes_included":true,"second_hand_good":true}'

    PUT /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 210

{"manufacturer":"Apple","origin_country_code":"FR","price":10.32,"purchase_price":10.32,"sku":"AZ123","title":"Shirt","description":"Size M","tax_rate":20,"type":0,"taxes_included":true,"second_hand_good":true}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "manufacturer": "Apple",
  "origin_country_code": "FR",
  "price": 10.32,
  "purchase_price": 10.32,
  "sku": "AZ123",
  "title": "Shirt",
  "description": "Size M",
  "tax_rate": 20,
  "type": 0,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "second_hand_good": true
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PUT", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Put.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"manufacturer\":\"Apple\",\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"price\":10.32,\"purchase_price\":10.32,\"sku\":\"AZ123\",\"title\":\"Shirt\",\"description\":\"Size M\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"type\":0,\"taxes_included\":true,\"second_hand_good\":true}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"manufacturer\":\"Apple\",\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"price\":10.32,\"purchase_price\":10.32,\"sku\":\"AZ123\",\"title\":\"Shirt\",\"description\":\"Size M\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"type\":0,\"taxes_included\":true,\"second_hand_good\":true}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PUT", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"manufacturer\":\"Apple\",\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"price\":10.32,\"purchase_price\":10.32,\"sku\":\"AZ123\",\"title\":\"Shirt\",\"description\":\"Size M\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"type\":0,\"taxes_included\":true,\"second_hand_good\":true}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.put("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"manufacturer\":\"Apple\",\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"price\":10.32,\"purchase_price\":10.32,\"sku\":\"AZ123\",\"title\":\"Shirt\",\"description\":\"Size M\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"type\":0,\"taxes_included\":true,\"second_hand_good\":true}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"manufacturer\":\"Apple\",\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"price\":10.32,\"purchase_price\":10.32,\"sku\":\"AZ123\",\"title\":\"Shirt\",\"description\":\"Size M\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"type\":0,\"taxes_included\":true,\"second_hand_good\":true}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PUT", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PUT /articles/{id}

    Body parameter

    {
  "manufacturer": "Apple",
  "origin_country_code": "FR",
  "price": 10.32,
  "purchase_price": 10.32,
  "sku": "AZ123",
  "title": "Shirt",
  "description": "Size M",
  "tax_rate": 20,
  "type": 0,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "second_hand_good": true
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body ArticleBody true none
    id path string true Article ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "currency": "EUR",
  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,
  "discount_type": "percentage",
  "rebate": 10,

      ]

      "key": "invoice.history.issued",
      "values": []
    }

  "total_excluding_taxes": 98.12,
  "date": 1566423220992,
  "name": "202212345",
  "status": "draft",
  "paid_date": 1566493220992,
  "due_date": 1656540000000,
  "attachments": [
    "myfile1.png",
    "mydocument.pdf"
  ],

    "address": "123 rue des archives",
    "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
    "zip": "A1234",
    "city": "Paris",
    "country_code": "FR",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "first_name": "John",
    "company_name": "John's company",
    "vat_number": "FR123456789",
    "display_name": "John Doe"
  }
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated article Invoice
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update an article (partial)

    Code samples

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '[{"op":"replace","path":"/manufacturer","value":"Google"}]'

    PATCH /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 58

[{"op":"replace","path":"/manufacturer","value":"Google"}]

    const data = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/manufacturer\",\"value\":\"Google\"}]";

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PATCH", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json-patch+json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/manufacturer\",\"value\":\"Google\"}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/manufacturer\",\"value\":\"Google\"}]"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json-patch+json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PATCH",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/manufacturer\",\"value\":\"Google\"}]",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/manufacturer\",\"value\":\"Google\"}]")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/articles/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    payload := strings.NewReader("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/manufacturer\",\"value\":\"Google\"}]")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PATCH", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PATCH /articles/{id}

    Body parameter

    [
  {
    "op": "replace",
    "path": "/manufacturer",
    "value": "Google"
  }
]

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body array[any] true none
    id path string true Article ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "manufacturer": "Apple",
  "origin_country_code": "FR",
  "price": 10.32,
  "purchase_price": 10.32,
  "sku": "AZ123",
  "title": "Shirt",
  "description": "Size M",
  "tax_rate": 20,
  "type": 0,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "second_hand_good": true
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated article Article
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Bank

    Managing your reports

    List all transactions

    Code samples

  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/banks/transactions \

  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/banks/transactions HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/banks/transactions");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/banks/transactions")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/banks/transactions", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/banks/transactions",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/banks/transactions")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/banks/transactions"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /banks/transactions

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    offset query integer false The (zero-based) offset of the first item returned in the collection. In a zero-based offset 0 is a correct value.
    limit query integer false The maximum number of entries to return. If the value exceeds the maximum, then the maximum value will be used.

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "balance": 3214,
  "transactions": [
    {
      "date": 1566493220992,
      "label": "Facebook ads",
      "amount": 52.04
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of transactions BankTransactionList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Activity

    Managing your activities

    List all activities

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);
