    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /activities

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    offset query integer false The (zero-based) offset of the first item returned in the collection. In a zero-based offset 0 is a correct value.
    limit query integer false The maximum number of entries to return. If the value exceeds the maximum, then the maximum value will be used.
    sort query string false Sort records by attributes

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "activities": [
    {
      "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
      "name": "My activity",
      "default": true
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of activities ActivityList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error

    Response Headers

    Status Header Type Format Description
    200 X-Total-Count integer Total entries
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Create an activity

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"name":"My activity","default":true}'

    POST /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 37

{"name":"My activity","default":true}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "name": "My activity",
  "default": true
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"My activity\",\"default\":true}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"name\":\"My activity\",\"default\":true}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"name\":\"My activity\",\"default\":true}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"name\":\"My activity\",\"default\":true}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"name\":\"My activity\",\"default\":true}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /activities

    Body parameter

    {
  "name": "My activity",
  "default": true
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body ActivityBody true none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "name": "My activity",
  "default": true
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Created activity Activity
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Retrieve an activity

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /activities/{id}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Activity ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "name": "My activity",
  "default": true
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return a single activity Activity
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Delete an activity

    Code samples

    curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    DELETE /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();

  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

    DELETE /activities/{id}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Activity ID

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The activity was deleted successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update an activity

    Code samples

    curl --request PUT \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"name":"My activity","default":true}'

    PUT /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 37

{"name":"My activity","default":true}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "name": "My activity",
  "default": true
});

  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

    require 'uri'

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"name\":\"My activity\",\"default\":true}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],

  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"name\":\"My activity\",\"default\":true}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"name\":\"My activity\",\"default\":true}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PUT", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PUT /activities/{id}

    Body parameter

    {
  "name": "My activity",
  "default": true
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body ActivityBody true none
    id path string true Activity ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "name": "My activity",
  "default": true
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated activity Activity
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update an activity (partial)

    Code samples

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '[{"op":"replace","path":"/name","value":"My activity"}]'

    PATCH /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 55

[{"op":"replace","path":"/name","value":"My activity"}]

    const data = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/name\",\"value\":\"My activity\"}]";

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PATCH", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json-patch+json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/name\",\"value\":\"My activity\"}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/name\",\"value\":\"My activity\"}]"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json-patch+json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PATCH",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/name\",\"value\":\"My activity\"}]",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/name\",\"value\":\"My activity\"}]")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/activities/636945f14ce97a4c1c561885"

    payload := strings.NewReader("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/name\",\"value\":\"My activity\"}]")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PATCH", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PATCH /activities/{id}

    Body parameter

    [
  {
    "op": "replace",
    "path": "/name",
    "value": "My activity"
  }
]

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body array[any] true none
    id path string true Activity ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "name": "My activity",
  "default": true
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated activity Activity
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Report

    Managing your reports

    Figures of the month

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url 'https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/monthly?month=1' \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/monthly?month=1 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/monthly?month=1");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/monthly?month=1")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/monthly?month=1", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/monthly?month=1",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/monthly?month=1")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/monthly?month=1"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /reports/revenue/monthly

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    month query integer true The month number of the year
    client_id query string false Filter revenue by client

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "summary": {
    "margin": 32483,
    "incomes": 6013,
    "expenses": 214,
    "variation": 10.3
  },
  "months": [
    {
      "month": 1,
      "margin": -393,
      "incomes": 456,
      "expenses": 849
    },
    {
      "month": 2,
      "margin": 4507,
      "incomes": 4556,
      "expenses": 49
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the figures of the month FiguresMonthReport
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Figures of the year

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url 'https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/yearly?year=0' \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/yearly?year=0 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/yearly?year=0");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/yearly?year=0")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/yearly?year=0", headers=headers)

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/yearly?year=0",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;

  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/revenue/yearly?year=0"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /reports/revenue/yearly

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    year query integer true The year
    client_id query string false Filter revenue by client

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "start": 2022,
  "summary": {
    "margin": 32483,
    "incomes": 6013,
    "expenses": 214,
    "variation": 10.3
  },
  "months": [
    {
      "month": 1,
      "margin": -393,
      "incomes": 456,
      "expenses": 849
    },
    {
      "month": 2,
      "margin": 4507,
      "incomes": 4556,
      "expenses": 49
    }
  ],
  "micro": {
    "distance_sales": {
      "amount": 1234,
      "vat_threshold": 45121,
      "micro_threshold": 98451
    },
    "services": {
      "amount": 213,
      "vat_threshold": 12015,
      "micro_threshold": 35120
    }
  }
}

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"

    const data = null;

  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/reports/urssaf/current"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

  "due_date": 1656540000000,

  "services_amount": 554,
  "other_services_amount": 787,
  "estimate": 457
}

  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    Account

    Managing your account

    Get current account

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

import (

func main() {

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)

    GET /users/me

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "first_name": "John",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "email": "john@google.com",
  "billing_provider": "chargebee",
  "display_name": "John Doe",
  "subscription_status": "trial"
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the connected account Account
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update current account

    Code samples

    curl --request PUT \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"first_name":"John","last_name":"Doe","email":"john@google.com"}'

    PUT /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 65

{"first_name":"John","last_name":"Doe","email":"john@google.com"}

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "first_name": "John",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "email": "john@google.com"
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PUT", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Put.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"first_name\":\"John\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"email\":\"john@google.com\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"first_name\":\"John\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"email\":\"john@google.com\"}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PUT", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"first_name\":\"John\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"email\":\"john@google.com\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.put("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"first_name\":\"John\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"email\":\"john@google.com\"}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"first_name\":\"John\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"email\":\"john@google.com\"}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PUT", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PUT /users/me

    Body parameter

    {
  "first_name": "John",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "email": "john@google.com"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body AccountBody true none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "first_name": "John",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "email": "john@google.com",
  "billing_provider": "chargebee",
  "display_name": "John Doe",
  "subscription_status": "trial"
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated account Account
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update current account (partial)

    Code samples

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '[{"op":"replace","path":"/last_name","value":"Dupont"}]'

    PATCH /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 55

[{"op":"replace","path":"/last_name","value":"Dupont"}]

    const data = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]";

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PATCH", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json-patch+json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json-patch+json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PATCH",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/users/me"

    payload := strings.NewReader("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PATCH", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PATCH /users/me

    Body parameter

    [
  {
    "op": "replace",
    "path": "/last_name",
    "value": "Dupont"
  }
]

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body array[any] true none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "first_name": "John",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "email": "john@google.com",
  "billing_provider": "chargebee",
  "display_name": "John Doe",
  "subscription_status": "trial"
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated account Account
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "company_name": "John's company",
  "trade_name": "Supercar",

  "phone": 456123456789,
  "mobile": 321564987,
  "registration_type": 0,
  "company_identifier": "123456DS",
  "vat_number": "123456DS",
  "insurance_type": 0,
  "insurance_company_name": "Super Insurance Company",
  "insurance_geographic_coverage": "France",
  "activity_type": 0,
  "second_hand_goods_selling": true,
  "urssaf_statement_frequency": "montly",
  "income_tax_discharged": true,
  "acre_applied": true,
  "creation_date": 1566493220992,
  "vat_liable": true,

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"trade_name\":\"Supercar\",\"email\":\"john@google.com\",\"phone\":456123456789,\"mobile\":321564987,\"registration_type\":0,\"company_identifier\":\"123456DS\",\"vat_number\":\"123456DS\",\"insurance_type\":0,\"insurance_company_name\":\"Super Insurance Company\",\"insurance_geographic_coverage\":\"France\",\"activity_type\":0,\"second_hand_goods_selling\":true,\"urssaf_statement_frequency\":\"montly\",\"income_tax_discharged\":true,\"acre_applied\":true,\"creation_date\":1566493220992,\"vat_liable\":true,\"vat_liability_date\":1566493220992,\"oss_liable\":true,\"oss_liability_date\":1566493220992,\"oss_threshold_exceeded\":true,\"oss_threshold_exceeding_date\":1566493220992,\"ioss_liable\":true,\"ioss_liability_date\":1566493220992}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$err = curl_error($curl);

  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;

  .header("Accept", "application/json")

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"trade_name\":\"Supercar\",\"email\":\"john@google.com\",\"phone\":456123456789,\"mobile\":321564987,\"registration_type\":0,\"company_identifier\":\"123456DS\",\"vat_number\":\"123456DS\",\"insurance_type\":0,\"insurance_company_name\":\"Super Insurance Company\",\"insurance_geographic_coverage\":\"France\",\"activity_type\":0,\"second_hand_goods_selling\":true,\"urssaf_statement_frequency\":\"montly\",\"income_tax_discharged\":true,\"acre_applied\":true,\"creation_date\":1566493220992,\"vat_liable\":true,\"vat_liability_date\":1566493220992,\"oss_liable\":true,\"oss_liability_date\":1566493220992,\"oss_threshold_exceeded\":true,\"oss_threshold_exceeding_date\":1566493220992,\"ioss_liable\":true,\"ioss_liability_date\":1566493220992}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PUT", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PUT /companies/my

    Body parameter

    {
  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "company_name": "John's company",
  "trade_name": "Supercar",
  "email": "john@google.com",
  "phone": 456123456789,
  "mobile": 321564987,
  "registration_type": 0,
  "company_identifier": "123456DS",
  "vat_number": "123456DS",
  "insurance_type": 0,
  "insurance_company_name": "Super Insurance Company",
  "insurance_geographic_coverage": "France",
  "activity_type": 0,
  "second_hand_goods_selling": true,
  "urssaf_statement_frequency": "montly",
  "income_tax_discharged": true,
  "acre_applied": true,
  "creation_date": 1566493220992,
  "vat_liable": true,
  "vat_liability_date": 1566493220992,
  "oss_liable": true,
  "oss_liability_date": 1566493220992,
  "oss_threshold_exceeded": true,
  "oss_threshold_exceeding_date": 1566493220992,
  "ioss_liable": true,
  "ioss_liability_date": 1566493220992
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body CompanyBody true none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "address": "123 rue des archives",
  "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
  "zip": "A1234",
  "city": "Paris",
  "country_code": "FR",
  "company_name": "John's company",
  "trade_name": "Supercar",
  "email": "john@google.com",
  "phone": 456123456789,
  "mobile": 321564987,
  "registration_type": 0,
  "company_identifier": "123456DS",
  "vat_number": "123456DS",

  "insurance_company_name": "Super Insurance Company",
  "insurance_geographic_coverage": "France",
  "activity_type": 0,
  "second_hand_goods_selling": true,
  "urssaf_statement_frequency": "montly",
  "income_tax_discharged": true,
  "acre_applied": true,

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Updated company Company
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Update current company (partial)

    Code samples

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '[{"op":"replace","path":"/last_name","value":"Dupont"}]'

    PATCH /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com
Content-Length: 55

[{"op":"replace","path":"/last_name","value":"Dupont"}]

    const data = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]";

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("PATCH", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json-patch+json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json-patch+json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PATCH",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my"

    payload := strings.NewReader("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/last_name\",\"value\":\"Dupont\"}]")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("PATCH", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json-patch+json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    PATCH /companies/my

    Body parameter

    [
  {
    "op": "replace",
    "path": "/last_name",
    "value": "Dupont"
  }
]

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body array[any] true none

    Example responses

    Delete the logo

    Code samples

    curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my/logo \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    DELETE /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my/logo HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("DELETE", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my/logo");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my/logo")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("DELETE", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my/logo", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my/logo",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "DELETE",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.delete("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my/logo")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/companies/my/logo"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("DELETE", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    DELETE /companies/my/logo

    Example responses

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    204 No Content The activity was deleted successfully None
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Tax

    Managing your taxes

    Get applicable taxes

    Code samples

    curl --request POST \

  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY' \
  --data '{"currency":"EUR","draft":true,"discount_amount":12.2,"discount_type":"percentage","rebate":10,"activity_id":"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf","template":"basic","shipping_amount":4.5,"shipping_tax_rate":20,"taxes_liable":true,"taxes_included":true,"client_id":"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf","billing_address":{"address":"123 rue des archives","address_supplement":"Porte gauche","zip":"A1234","city":"Paris","country_code":"FR","last_name":"Doe","first_name":"John","company_name":"John'\''s company","vat_number":"FR123456789","display_name":"John Doe"},"subject":"Design of the homepage","lines":[{"sku":"AX123","description":"Mockup and copywriting","title":"Homepage design","type":0,"price":120.32,"quantity":1,"unit":"piece","discount_amount":10,"discount_type":"percentage","tax_rate":20,"origin_country_code":"FR","second_hand_good":false,"disbursement_fees":false,"article_id":"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf"},{"sku":"AX456","description":"Logo with 3 colors","title":"Logo design","type":0,"price":59,"quantity":1,"unit":"piece","discount_amount":0,"discount_type":"percentage","tax_rate":20,"origin_country_code":"FR","second_hand_good":false,"disbursement_fees":false,"article_id":"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf"}],"lines_groups":[{"name":"Design and mockup","articles":[0,1]}],"comments":"Payment to be done within 3 days","payment_conditions_included":true,"language":"fr","tax_exemption_text":"Article 138 CE/2008","payment_methods":["cash","credit_card"],"execution_date":1566493220992,"online_payment_enabled":true,"payment_gateways_id":["5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf","5b17da549a7feb695f703975"],"tracking_numbers":["456SDFDFD"],"tracking_carriers":["UPS"]}'

    const data = JSON.stringify({
  "currency": "EUR",
  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,
  "discount_type": "percentage",
  "rebate": 10,
  "activity_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "template": "basic",
  "shipping_amount": 4.5,
  "shipping_tax_rate": 20,
  "taxes_liable": true,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "client_id": "54tefds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "billing_address": {
    "address": "123 rue des archives",
    "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
    "zip": "A1234",
    "city": "Paris",
    "country_code": "FR",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "first_name": "John",
    "company_name": "John's company",
    "vat_number": "FR123456789",
    "display_name": "John Doe"
  },
  "subject": "Design of the homepage",
  "lines": [
    {
      "sku": "AX123",
      "description": "Mockup and copywriting",
      "title": "Homepage design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 120.32,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 10,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf"
    },
    {
      "sku": "AX456",
      "description": "Logo with 3 colors",
      "title": "Logo design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 59,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 0,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf"
    }
  ],
  "lines_groups": [
    {
      "name": "Design and mockup",
      "articles": [
        0,
        1
      ]
    }
  ],
  "comments": "Payment to be done within 3 days",
  "payment_conditions_included": true,
  "language": "fr",
  "tax_exemption_text": "Article 138 CE/2008",
  "payment_methods": [
    "cash",
    "credit_card"
  ],
  "execution_date": 1566493220992,
  "online_payment_enabled": true,
  "payment_gateways_id": [
    "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
    "5b17da549a7feb695f703975"
  ],
  "tracking_numbers": [
    "456SDFDFD"
  ],
  "tracking_carriers": [
    "UPS"
  ]
});

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("POST", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/taxes/check_liability");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/taxes/check_liability")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["Content-Type"] = 'application/json'
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'
request.body = "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

payload = "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/taxes/check_liability", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/taxes/check_liability",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "Content-Type: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/taxes/check_liability")
  .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .body("{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "strings"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/taxes/check_liability"

    payload := strings.NewReader("{\"currency\":\"EUR\",\"draft\":true,\"discount_amount\":12.2,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"rebate\":10,\"activity_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"template\":\"basic\",\"shipping_amount\":4.5,\"shipping_tax_rate\":20,\"taxes_liable\":true,\"taxes_included\":true,\"client_id\":\"54tefds258126ab647499f9bf\",\"billing_address\":{\"address\":\"123 rue des archives\",\"address_supplement\":\"Porte gauche\",\"zip\":\"A1234\",\"city\":\"Paris\",\"country_code\":\"FR\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"company_name\":\"John's company\",\"vat_number\":\"FR123456789\",\"display_name\":\"John Doe\"},\"subject\":\"Design of the homepage\",\"lines\":[{\"sku\":\"AX123\",\"description\":\"Mockup and copywriting\",\"title\":\"Homepage design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":120.32,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":10,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf\"},{\"sku\":\"AX456\",\"description\":\"Logo with 3 colors\",\"title\":\"Logo design\",\"type\":0,\"price\":59,\"quantity\":1,\"unit\":\"piece\",\"discount_amount\":0,\"discount_type\":\"percentage\",\"tax_rate\":20,\"origin_country_code\":\"FR\",\"second_hand_good\":false,\"disbursement_fees\":false,\"article_id\":\"5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf\"}],\"lines_groups\":[{\"name\":\"Design and mockup\",\"articles\":[0,1]}],\"comments\":\"Payment to be done within 3 days\",\"payment_conditions_included\":true,\"language\":\"fr\",\"tax_exemption_text\":\"Article 138 CE/2008\",\"payment_methods\":[\"cash\",\"credit_card\"],\"execution_date\":1566493220992,\"online_payment_enabled\":true,\"payment_gateways_id\":[\"5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf\",\"5b17da549a7feb695f703975\"],\"tracking_numbers\":[\"456SDFDFD\"],\"tracking_carriers\":[\"UPS\"]}")

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    POST /taxes/check_liability

    Body parameter

    {
  "currency": "EUR",
  "draft": true,
  "discount_amount": 12.2,
  "discount_type": "percentage",
  "rebate": 10,
  "activity_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "template": "basic",
  "shipping_amount": 4.5,
  "shipping_tax_rate": 20,
  "taxes_liable": true,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "client_id": "54tefds258126ab647499f9bf",
  "billing_address": {
    "address": "123 rue des archives",
    "address_supplement": "Porte gauche",
    "zip": "A1234",
    "city": "Paris",
    "country_code": "FR",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "first_name": "John",
    "company_name": "John's company",
    "vat_number": "FR123456789",
    "display_name": "John Doe"
  },
  "subject": "Design of the homepage",
  "lines": [
    {
      "sku": "AX123",
      "description": "Mockup and copywriting",
      "title": "Homepage design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 120.32,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 10,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5efds258126ab647499f9bf"
    },
    {
      "sku": "AX456",
      "description": "Logo with 3 colors",
      "title": "Logo design",
      "type": 0,
      "price": 59,
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit": "piece",
      "discount_amount": 0,
      "discount_type": "percentage",
      "tax_rate": 20,
      "origin_country_code": "FR",
      "second_hand_good": false,
      "disbursement_fees": false,
      "article_id": "5d5aaaa451ab647499f9bf"
    }
  ],
  "lines_groups": [
    {
      "name": "Design and mockup",
      "articles": [
        0,
        1
      ]
    }
  ],
  "comments": "Payment to be done within 3 days",
  "payment_conditions_included": true,
  "language": "fr",
  "tax_exemption_text": "Article 138 CE/2008",
  "payment_methods": [
    "cash",
    "credit_card"
  ],
  "execution_date": 1566493220992,
  "online_payment_enabled": true,
  "payment_gateways_id": [
    "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
    "5b17da549a7feb695f703975"
  ],
  "tracking_numbers": [
    "456SDFDFD"
  ],
  "tracking_carriers": [
    "UPS"
  ]
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body InvoiceBody true none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "taxable_country_code": "FR",
  "taxes_liable": true,
  "tax_exemption_text": {
    "fr": "Article 138 CE/2008",
    "en": "Article 138 CE/2008"
  }
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    404 Response

    {
  "code": 404,
  "message": "Resource not found"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Tax Liability TaxLiability
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    404 Not Found The specified resource was not found Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Miscellaneous

    Transverval ressources

    List of supported countries

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/countries \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/countries HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/countries");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/countries")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/countries", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/countries",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/countries")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/countries"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /countries

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "countries": [
    {
      "code": "FR",
      "eu_member": true,
      "label": {
        "fr": "France",
        "en": "France"
      }
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of countries CountryList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/currencies");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

]);

  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
