    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/currencies"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /currencies

    Example responses

  "currencies": [
    {
      "code": "EUR",
      "symbol": "",
      "label": {
        "fr": "Euros",
        "en": "Euros"
      }
    }
  ]

  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"

  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"

    List of supported VAT rates

    Code samples

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/vat_rates \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/vat_rates HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.withCredentials = true;

xhr.addEventListener("readystatechange", function () {
  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

xhr.open("GET", "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/vat_rates");
xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
xhr.setRequestHeader("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY");

xhr.send(data);

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/vat_rates")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["Accept"] = 'application/json'
request["X-Api-Key"] = 'API_KEY'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("virtserver.swaggerhub.com")

headers = {
    'Accept': "application/json",
    'X-Api-Key': "API_KEY"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/vat_rates", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    <?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/vat_rates",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/vat_rates")
  .header("Accept", "application/json")
  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")
  .asString();

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/vat_rates"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /vat_rates

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "vat_rates": [
    {
      "code": "EUR",
      "standard_rate": 20,
      "reduced_rates": [
        13,
        10,
        0
      ]
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of VAT rates VatRatesList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    List of supported payment methods

    Code samples

  --url https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payment_methods \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Api-Key: API_KEY'

    GET /lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payment_methods HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
X-Api-Key: API_KEY
Host: virtserver.swaggerhub.com


    const data = null;

xhr.withCredentials = true;

  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

    <?php

  CURLOPT_URL => "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payment_methods",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Accept: application/json",
    "X-Api-Key: API_KEY"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

  .header("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "net/http"
    "io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

    url := "https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/lpb/bizyness-api/1.0.0/payment_methods"

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

    req.Header.Add("Accept", "application/json")
    req.Header.Add("X-Api-Key", "API_KEY")

    res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

    defer res.Body.Close()
    body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

    fmt.Println(res)
    fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    GET /payment_methods

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "payment_methods": [
    {
      "code": "cash",
      "label": {
        "fr": "Espce",
        "en": "Cash"
      }
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of payment methods PaymentMethodsList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    const data = null;

  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);
  }
});

    const data = null;

  if (this.readyState === this.DONE) {
    console.log(this.responseText);

    GET /templates

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {
  "templates": [
    {
      "code": "paris",
      "label": {
        "fr": "Paris",
        "en": "Paris"
      }
    }
  ]
}

    401 Response

    {
  "code": 401,
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}

    500 Response

    {
  "code": 500,
  "message": "Internal server error"
}

    Responses

    Status Meaning Description Schema
    200 OK Return the list of templates DocumentTemplatesList
    401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Error
    500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error Error
    To perform this operation, you must be authenticated by means of one of the following methods: ApiKey, JWTAuth

    Schemas

    Error

    {
  "message": "string",
  "code": 0
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    message string true none The error message indicating what the issue is
    code integer true none The http status code

    JSONPatchRequestAddReplaceTest

    {
  "path": "string",
  "value": null
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    path string true none A JSON Pointer path.
    value any true none The value to add, replace or test.

    JSONPatchRequestRemove

    {
  "path": "string",
  "op": "remove"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    path string true none A JSON Pointer path.
    op string true none The operation to perform.

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    op remove

    JSONPatchRequestMoveCopy

    {
  "path": "string",
  "op": "move"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    path string true none A JSON Pointer path.
    op string true none The operation to perform.

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    op move
    op copy

    ArticleBody

    {
  "manufacturer": "Apple",
  "origin_country_code": "FR",
  "price": 10.32,
  "purchase_price": 10.32,
  "sku": "AZ123",
  "title": "Shirt",
  "description": "Size M",
  "tax_rate": 20,
  "type": 0,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "second_hand_good": true
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    manufacturer string false none none
    origin_country_code string false none none
    price number false none none
    purchase_price number false none none
    sku string false none none
    title string false none none
    description string false none none
    tax_rate number false none none
    type integer false none none
    taxes_included boolean false none none
    second_hand_good boolean false none none

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "manufacturer": "Apple",
  "origin_country_code": "FR",
  "price": 10.32,
  "purchase_price": 10.32,
  "sku": "AZ123",
  "title": "Shirt",
  "description": "Size M",
  "tax_rate": 20,
  "type": 0,
  "taxes_included": true,
  "second_hand_good": true
}

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous CollectionId false none none

    anonymous ArticleBody false none none

      "month": 1,

      "margin": 4507,
      "incomes": 4556,

    {
  "start": 2022,
  "summary": {
    "margin": 32483,
    "incomes": 6013,
    "expenses": 214,
    "variation": 10.3
  },
  "months": [
    {
      "month": 1,
      "margin": -393,
      "incomes": 456,
      "expenses": 849
    },

      "month": 2,
      "margin": 4507,
      "incomes": 4556,
      "expenses": 49
    }
  ],

    "distance_sales": {
      "amount": 1234,
      "vat_threshold": 45121,
      "micro_threshold": 98451
    },
    "services": {
      "amount": 213,
      "vat_threshold": 12015,
      "micro_threshold": 35120
    }
  }
}

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "name": "My activity",
  "default": true
}

  "name": "My activity",
  "default": true
}

    {
  "id": "5d5eca258126ab647499f9bf",
  "amount": 123.21,
  "currency": "EUR",
  "label": "Subscription",
  "date": 1566493220992,
  "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
  "method": "cash"

    {
  "amount": 123.21,
  "currency": "EUR",
  "label": "Subscription",
  "date": 1566493220992,
  "comment": "Client will provide the next payment tomorrow",
  "method": "cash"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    amount number false none none
    currency string false none none
    label string false none none
    date integer false none none
    comment string false none none
    method string false none none

}

    Properties
